[Home](https://www.cityofonalaska.us/)


* [Your Government
  »](https://www.cityofonalaska.us/boards)
  + City Government
    ---------------

    The
    [Onalaska City Council](https://www.cityofonalaska.us/city-council)
    is responsible for making policy decisions, adopting ordinances, approving contractual agreements, adopting the annual budget, and making appointments such as the City Secretary and the Municipal Court Judge.

    - [Other Local Officials](http://www.co.polk.tx.us/)
    - [State & Federal Officials](http://www.usa.gov/elected-officials)
* [Departments
  »](https://www.cityofonalaska.us/departments)
  + - [City Administrator](https://www.cityofonalaska.us/city-administrator "Human Resources")

    - [Building Inspector/Code Enforcement](https://www.cityofonalaska.us/permitsinspectionscode-enforcement)

    *[All Departments...](https://www.cityofonalaska.us/departments)*
* [Our Community
  »](https://www.cityofonalaska.us/our-community)
  + Located at the heart of Lake Livingston, 80 miles north of Houston, the Onalaska area offers outdoor and recreational activities that provide fun for all ages. Visitors and residents will find a great selection of campgrounds, RV parks, marinas and restaurants. Onalaska continues to be a popular vacation and retirement community, with a small-town quality and country atmosphere.

    - [Onalaska History](https://www.cityofonalaska.us/our-community/pages/onalaska-history)
    - [Marina Locations](https://www.cityofonalaska.us/our-community/pages/map-marina-locations)

    *[Learn More...](https://www.cityofonalaska.us/our-community)*
